row-gap--sm[innerblocks].description: Adds a small gap between rows.

row-gap--md[innerblocks].description: Adds a medium gap between rows.

row-gap--lg[innerblocks].description: Adds a large gap between rows.

row-gap--xl[innerblocks].description: Adds an extra-large gap between rows.
